reasoning: FINAL CYCLE APEX - SHADOW NETWORK COMPLETES. The 10 VP petition (COURT_006+COURT_010+COURT_014, all three 1-slot courtiers) breaks the 124-124 tie with P2 decisively. Triple Turn-5 ability deployment: Blackbeard floods Docks with 4 FREE cubes (DOC_04 flip, DOC_05/06 claims), Varro secures Barracks with 3 FREE cubes (BAR_04 flip from P3), Vane surgically removes P2's 2 cubes from COURT_011 to flip Maritime courtier to my control. Full 14-cube influence pool deploys across Palace expansion (4 new squares), Market contestation (MKT_03 flip), Barracks defense (BAR_05 flip), Docks extension (DOC_07), and COURT_013 courtier grab (3/4 majority). Courtier count rises from 5 to 7. The 10 VP petition plus ~11 VP from new district squares creates an overwhelming 20+ VP swing. Mathematical precision yields decisive advantage entering the final 2 turns.
recruitment_note: Conspiracy positions 1-7 all occupied. Recruiting to position 8+ would not activate before cycle end (Turn 7 max). No recruitment value.

strategic_assessment.position_summary: This turn transforms a 124-124 VP tie into a commanding ~28 VP lead. The Shadow Network petition (10 VP) plus territorial expansion across 11 new squares (~18 VP) creates a margin that P2 cannot close in 2 remaining turns.

COURT_013 (Underworld Boss Vex, Criminal, 3/4 - controlled after placement)

districts_projected.Palace: 7/9 squares (PAL_01-07). Only PAL_08 (0 VP) and PAL_09 (-1 VP) remain. Effectively complete.
districts_projected.Docks: 7/8 squares (DOC_01-07). Only DOC_08 (0 VP) remains. Effectively complete.
districts_projected.Barracks: 3/7 squares (BAR_03-05). P3 controls majority but cracking.

opponent_threats.P2: 22 gold for cycle-end conversion (7 VP). 16 influence pool. Academic + Commercial factions. Will likely expand Market and Academy. Their COURT_012 promotion is permanent.
opponent_threats.P3: 23 influence pool is massive. Military + Commercial + Religious factions. Will flood Barracks and Temple. District controller powers in Market, Temple, Barracks give them action advantages.

strategic_assessment.turns_remaining: 2 turns (Turn 6, Turn 7) before Cycle 5 ends. Focus: defend positions, accumulate gold for conversion, expand Palace to full 9/9 for maximum district bonus.
strategic_assessment.cycle_end_planning: 20 gold = 6 VP conversion at 3:1. Agent upgrades and additional promotions require VP investment. With 7 courtiers controlled, aggressive promotion spending could push toward 8/14 victory threshold. Mathematical evaluation needed at cycle transition.
